price: 127. Yalli Badri Saaku moominiinit woo cato kah Abem koroosite marak horta Qidaah hinnay Qidimik keenik tisillimem Rookittaah xixxibittamkeh iyyaanama, tokkel usun (koros kinnuk) gurrusak Sugen iisak Buhaanaah xixxibaane luk gacan.
arabic: لِيَقۡطَعَ طَرَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَوۡ يَكۡبِتَهُمۡ فَيَنقَلِبُواْ خَآئِبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: liyaqṭaʿa ṭarafan mina alladhīna kafarū aw yakbitahum fayanqalibū khāibīna
